response_requirements.initial_response_description: General public records: As soon as reasonably possible. Data subject requests (personal data): 10 business days maximum. Immediate compliance preferred when possible.
response_requirements.no_response_consequence: File administrative complaint or seek district court review

fee_structure.standard_copy_fee: Limited to 25 cents per page for first 100 pages
fee_structure.electronic_fee: Actual cost of providing electronic copies
fee_structure.notes: Inspection is free. May require prepayment if costs expected to exceed $100. Additional fees allowed for commercially valuable data.

exemptions.description: Personnel data classified as nonpublic or protected nonpublic
Trade secret information and proprietary business data

appeal_process.appeal_authority: Appropriate state agency or Administrative Law Judge
appeal_process.appeal_description: File administrative complaint with agency (15 business days for response, 20 business days for ALJ preliminary determination) OR file directly in district court for de novo review.

penalties.civil: Attorney fees available in some circumstances

requester_requirements.specific_format: No specific form required. May require reasonable identification verification for data subject requests (personal data).
requester_requirements.notes: All government data are public by default. Cannot impose unreasonable identification burdens.

specific_obligations: Train staff on data practices requirements
Provide written explanation for denials citing specific legal basis
Respond as soon as reasonably possible (10 days for data subject requests)

oversight_body.name: Administrative Law Judge and District Court
oversight_body.role: ALJ provides preliminary determinations on administrative complaints. District Court provides de novo review.
oversight_body.contact_info: File with appropriate state agency or district court
enforcement_powers: ALJ: Preliminary determinations within 20 business days
Court: De novo review of classification decisions
Court: Award attorney fees in some cases

validation_metadata.verification_notes: Parsed from official statutory text file. Response time verified against canonical-values.json (10 business days for data subject requests, 'as soon as reasonably possible' for general requests). 5 exemptions parsed. Comprehensive classification system: public, nonpublic, protected nonpublic, confidential.
